name: Fancy Lightbox
author: Alobaidi

sections.description:
Fancy Lightbox

Add fancy lightbox easily, responsive lightbox and easy to use, without options and without complexity, compatible with all major browsers.

The Features

  1. Easy to use, just activate the plugin.
  2. Responsive lightbox using Fancy Lightbox jQuery.
  3. Without options and without complexity.
  4. Compatible with any slider.
  5. Compatible with all major browsers.

Live Demo

  • http://wp-plugins.in/fancy-lightbox

Rate The Plugin

  • Please rate Fancy Lightbox plugin

More Plugins

  • My Plugins
sections.installation:
Installation

  1. Upload ‘fancy-lightbox’ folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Now plugin is ready! but read explanation of use.
sections.faq:
FAQ

  • Read explanation of use
  • For more questions or help, contact me.
  • Or on twitter.
